text:
The latest version of something seem to have broke some code. The following code no longer works on WGLMakie

```julia> R = range(-2π, 2π, length = 1000)
-6.283185307179586:0.012578949563923095:6.283185307179586

julia> plot(R, sin.(R))
ERROR: MethodError: no method matching alignedbboxobservable!(::Observable{GeometryBasics.HyperRectangle{2,Float32}}, ::Observable{Tuple{Union{Nothing, Float32},Union{Nothing, Float32}}}, ::Observable{Any}, ::Observable{Tuple{Any,Any}}, ::Observable{Tuple{Union{Nothing, Float32},Union{Nothing, Float32}}}, ::Observable{GridLayoutBase.AlignMode}, ::Observable{GridLayoutBase.RectSides{Float32}})

... (full error in comments)```

text: still not sure how this happened, and why it's not caught by the tests...I'm suspecting that some package didn't correctly specify version bounds, so that there is a dependency not on the right version

text:
Hmm, I get
```(@v1.5) pkg> add Observables#master
    Cloning git-repo `<https://github.com/JuliaGizmos/Observables.jl.git>`
ERROR: failed to clone from <https://github.com/JuliaGizmos/Observables.jl.git>, error: GitError(Code:ECERTIFICATE, Class:SSL, the SSL certificate is invalid)```

elements.text: , error: GitError(Code:ECERTIFICATE, Class:SSL, the SSL certificate is invalid)

text: That's probably unrelated. The problem is fixed now.

ERROR: MethodError: no method matching alignedbboxobservable!(::Observable{GeometryBasics.HyperRectangle{2,Float32}}, ::Observable{Tuple{Union{Nothing, Float32},Union{Nothing, Float32}}}, ::Observable{Any}, ::Observable{Tuple{Any,Any}}, ::Observable{Tuple{Union{Nothing, Float32},Union{Nothing, Float32}}}, ::Observable{GridLayoutBase.AlignMode}, ::Observable{GridLayoutBase.RectSides{Float32}})
